mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_option(m_id, m_option, content, price, reg_date) VALUES(#{mId}, #{mOption}, #{content}, #{price}, SYSDATE())
INSERT INTO menu(s_id, category, name, price, m_info, m_pictureURL, reg_date) VALUES(#{sId}, #{category}, #{name}, #{price}, #{mInfo}, #{mPictureUrl}, SYSDATE())

INSERT INTO shop(id, name, phone, zipcode, address1, address2, owner, s_number, s_licenseURL, reg_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{owner}, #{sNumber}, #{sLicenseURL}, SYSDATE())
